data.message: Susan Sapp Justice: If you think the children of gay people would be more likely to turn out gay, think about the fact that EVERY SINGLE GAY PERSON is the offspring of two straight people. If you idiot conservatives choose to villify somebody, be logical about it. There are gay children with straight parents. If sexual orientation was modeled after one's parents, wouldn't homosexuality not exist? Or did you lose your brain on the way to the far right? Morons.

replies.message: way to go Aris...you said it in a nutshell
